item.title: Please clean up the allay, 7th July

item.title: Pavement dropped down between 14 -16 Montrose Avenue, 7th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Montrose Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.title: Please sweep and clear the stairs case and allay by clock house station up to king hall road and stairs case has not been done now for over a year now and needs doing soon as possible. the whole area needs a deep clean as well. The managements should look at it as well as its a very poor service., 7th July
item.description:
Please sweep and clear the stairs case and allay by clock house station up to king hall road and stairs case has not been done now for over a year now and needs doing soon as possible. the whole area needs a deep clean as well. item.title: Ongoing issue: area not cleaned, incorrect resolution status, 7th July
item.description:

item.title: Overhanging tree blocking the vision when driving in and out of my drive way at 34a Park Avenue, 7th July
item.description:
This is a safety hazard when we are driving children to school in and out of the drive way. The overhanging tree is brushing our car and blocking the vision of the car when coming in and out of the drive way. Please have it pruned higher.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
